mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_comment_id AS feedCommentId, A.comment, A.created_at AS createdAt, B.user_id AS writerId, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic FROM feed_comment A INNER JOIN user B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE A.feed_id = #{feed_id} ORDER BY A.created_at ASC LIMIT 4
